channel.title: -Closed-
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "-Closed-" - Rune collection complete.

item.title: Re: Two Ocelots and a Wolf for trade
item.content:encoded:
I would trade my Fox Rune for your Ocelot Rune.

Character name is Zinthos. I would prefer sending them via storehouse, but bucket trade will do too, I guess. Just message me InGame, when you're ready to trade.

item.title: Two Ocelots and a Wolf for trade
item.content:encoded:
I'm looking for Lightning, Fox and Mantis Runes for my character McAwesome. I'll also accept a Lab Coat for one of the Runes, if that isn't considered outlandish.

Edit: I got a Fox Rune from my daily farming while waiting for Zinthos' trade, so I now have one of those to offer.

Edit*2: Got my Lightning, just need a Mantis and I'll trade my other Runes for monster drops.
